name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission o/b/o Robin Garner, Appellants, v. John SMOCZYLO, Appellee

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission o/b/o Robin Garner, Appellants, v. John SMOCZYLO, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 2013, the Orders of the Commonwealth Court are hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
64 A.3d 626
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission o/b/o Robin Garner, Appellants, v. John SMOCZYLO, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 25, 2013.
